name: pjh
description: Outputs colorized documentation for your package.json scripts to the console.

scripts.test: export FORCE_COLOR=true && ./pjh.js "$(cat tests/package.json.test)" #pjh run a test
scripts.examples: npm run examples:full && npm run examples:pjh && npm run examples:pjh-ignore && npm run examples:no-documentation-available #pjh runs all examples
scripts.examples:full: export FORCE_COLOR=true && ./pjh.js "$(cat examples/package.json.full)" #pjh runs the full example
scripts.examples:pjh: export FORCE_COLOR=true && ./pjh.js "$(cat examples/package.json.pjh)" #pjh runs the pjh example
scripts.examples:pjh-ignore: export FORCE_COLOR=true && ./pjh.js "$(cat examples/package.json.pjh-ignore)" #pjh runs the pjh-ignore example
scripts.examples:no-documentation-available: export FORCE_COLOR=true && ./pjh.js "$(cat examples/package.json.no-documentation-available)" #pjh runs the no-documentation-available example
scripts.help: npx pjh #pjh show this help information
